newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Meralco capex 31 bln pesos over 5 years.
newsitem.headline: Meralco capex 31 bln pesos over 5 years.

text.p: Manila Electric Co said on Thursday it will need 31.05 billion pesos in capital expenditures over the next five years to upgrade existing facilities and put up new substations.
Meralco senior vice-president Jesus Francisco told reporters that in 1997 the company will need 5.227 billion pesos for its projects.
Francisco said the bulk of the capital outlay over the next five years, 14.39 billion pesos, will be earmarked for the company's engineering services.
A total of 96 substations will be built over the five-year period.
